description: Get ready to power through uphills and descents with this mid-cut Gore-Tex version of the updated X-Ultra 4. It is as agile as a trail-running shoe but with all the stability, grip and waterproof protection you need to tackle technical terrain. Equipped with a new chassis, the shoe is even better at protecting sensitive articulations without compromising freedom of movement.
name: Salomon X Ultra 4 Mid GTX - Mens
